title: Lima Walking City Tour with Catacombs Museum visit (Small Group)
description: Get a thorough overview of Lima's UNESCO-listed historical treasures in just half a day on a small-group walking tour. This tour is perfect for curious travelers who want to maximize their time in the Peruvian capital. The robust itinerary takes you to San Martin Square, Plaza de Armas, the Cathedral, City Hall, and more. The tour's highlight is visiting the Monastery of San Francisco and its catacombs.
all_descriptions: Get a thorough overview of Lima's UNESCO-listed historical treasures in just half a day on a small-group walking tour. This tour is perfect for curious travelers who want to maximize their time in the Peruvian capital. The robust itinerary takes you to San Martin Square, Plaza de Armas, the Cathedral, City Hall, and more. The tour's highlight is visiting the Monastery of San Francisco and its catacombs.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Plaza San Martin, Av. Nicolas de Pierola cdra. 9, Lima 15001 PeruAfter picking you up, this will be the first site to visit, a wonderful plaza made in 19 hundred to commemorate 100 years of Peruvian independence. It has a fascinating statue that represents Peru’s liberator. The surrounding buildings are stunning, displaying the neoclassic style. Also, the old “Bolivar Hotel” can be seen here.Duration: 30 minutesStop At:Plaza de Armas (Plaza Mayor), Jr. Junin and Jr. Carabaya, Lima PeruThen, we will go to the (Main square), the most representative one in Peru where you will see impressive old buildings such as “The Presidential Palace”, “The City Hall”, “The Cathedral of Lima”, and more. Lear about the rich history of Peru’s capital from your expert guide.Duration: 30 minutesStop At:Museo Convento San Francisco y Catacumbas, Jiron Ancash, Lima 15001 PeruFinally, we will take you to the most amazing museum in downtown Lima. Here, you will be explained about the colonial period in Peru. Get ready to visit the underground catacombs and learn about its fascinating stories.Duration: 1 hour

Robert H
Northern Virginia, VA83 contributions

Exceptional Guide & Informative Tour

Excellent +3 hr tour of downtown historic area and St Francis Monastery & Catacombs. Martin, our guide, was exceptionally informative, engaging, considerate and easy to understand. His deep and detailed knowledge of the history, construction, art, religious practices, and cultural aspects of the monastery and historic area made it a very rich and rewarding experience. Great driver and comfortable vehicle as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Tour in a small circle
reviews.text: The tour to the historic center of Lima was very interesting.  Our tour guide Martin had the difficulty of leading the tour for two in Spanish and for two in English with four people in the group. He has designed this very confidently. I liked it very much

reviews.title: Martin was an excellent guide full of knowledge and inside. He made this a wonderful experience.
reviews.text: Martin was a wonderful resource of knowledge. He shared insights and stories about the places. He made sure we were haven’t a good time and enjoyed the tour. When we had questions he was there to answer them. It gave me a new perspective of South American culture.

reviews.title: Awesome Historic Lima tour!!
reviews.text: We took a tour of historic Lima that included the Saint Francis Monastery and the catacombs. The tour also included transportation from and to the hotel in Miraflores.Our tour guide was Martin. He was awesome!! Very knowledgeable and friendly. We started the tour in Plaza San Martin, to then walk down Union alleyway that took us to Plaza de Armas, and finally the catacombs.It was by far the highlight of our time in Lima. Highly recommended to anyone visiting this beautiful city.

reviews.title: Excellent Alvaro Guide, Very Pro, Good Information and Always willing to clarify doubts. It also provides timelyTotalme
reviews.text: Excellent Guide, very good and varied information. Pro and pleasant. Always ready to clarify doubts or give timely suggestions. Fully recommended.

reviews.title: A worth while endeavor.
reviews.text: Our tour guide Alvaro was the best! The tour was very informative. So glad we took the time to do this. I would recommend this to anyone who would like to know a little more about the city.

reviews.title: A Wonderful Morning in Lima with Great Guide
reviews.text: Lots of information but not too much and Jonathan is able to share all his knowledge with what you know or are interested in. Very special and Jonathan himself is a beautiful storyteller and is visibly proud and that makes everything even more special! Loved every minute of it!

reviews.title: Discover the city center of lime and catacombs main monuments. Religious shrines and main squares..
reviews.text: Excellent Experience and Excellent Tour Guide. Super comfortable transport. On time and very friendly. 100% Recommended

reviews.title: Exceptional Tour of Lima with Martin!
reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of exploring Lima with Martin as my guide, and I can't recommend him enough! Martin's extensive knowledge of the city's history and culture, combined with his passion for sharing it, made the tour truly exceptional. He was not only incredibly informative but also friendly and professional, making the experience enjoyable and memorable. If you're looking for an outstanding guide in Lima, Martin is definitely the one to choose!
